message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your turn to be fair, Alice. How about a 55/45 split?
I can do 58-42, it's as fair as I can go.
Time is ticking, Alice. I'm offering you a 48/52 split. Let's be reasonable.
I'm willing to compromise, 56-44 is my final offer before things get ugly.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
